title: [BUG] ToSKBitmap() doesn't work properly

comments.author: Odirb
comments.body:
Hello,
I have the same kind of problem with ToSKBitmap function when I use bitmaps with transparency. The problem can be reproduce easily with this sample : https://github.com/Odirb/BugSkiaSharpWinform

I have fixed a problem inside ToSKPixmap function, and I will send a pull request.
Regards.

comments.author: Mondonno
mattleibow
comments.body: @Mondonno make sure you install the `SkiaSharp.Views` package as well. The normal `SkiaSharp` package is just the .NET Standard library. For platform specifics, it is found inside the `.Views` packages.
